Service: Azure Managed Instance for Apache Cassandra

Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for database size, replication, consistency levels, and performance metrics. Identify the applications and services that will use the database.
Design the database architecture, including keyspaces, tables, replication strategies, and integration with existing systems.
Create and configure the Azure Managed Instance for Apache Cassandra in the Azure portal or using Azure CLI/PowerShell.
Set up security measures such as authentication, encryption, and access control policies for the managed instance.
Configure automated backups and define restore policies to ensure data resiliency.
Configure monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and other tools to track database performance and health.
Perform thorough testing of the database, including read/write operations, latency measurements, and failover scenarios.
Fine-tune database settings such as compaction strategies, caching, and indexing to improve performance.
Document the database architecture, configurations, and operational procedures. Provide training for the operations team.
Verify that the database setup meets regulatory compliance requirements. Implement regular auditing procedures to ensure security and compliance.
